problem_text_cn: 如图,在▱ABCD中,点E是DC边上一点,连接AE、BE,已知AE是∠DAB的平分线,BE是∠CBA的平分线,若AE=3,BE=2,则平行四边形ABCD的面积为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, in ▱ABCD, point E is a point on the side of DC, connecting AE and BE. It is known that AE is the bisector of ∠DAB, and BE is the bisector of ∠CBA. If AE = N_0, BE = N_1, it is parallel The area of ​​the quadrilateral ABCD is ()
raw_answer: 解:∵AE是∠DAB的平分线,BE是∠CBA的平分线,∴∠DAE=∠EAB,∠CBE=∠ABE,∵AD∥BC,∴∠DAB+∠CBA=180°,∴∠EAB+∠EBA=90°,∵AE=3,BE=2,∴S~△ABE~=\frac{1}{2}×2×3=3,∴平行四边形ABCD的面积为:6．故选:B．
raw_comment: 此题主要考查了平行四边形的性质以及直角三角形的性质,得出S~△ABE~是解题关键．
